cmd.name: [[14862905]]Seed D@istribution[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[14877670]]First Forester upgrade. \n\n Allows Workers to plant buildings for resource collection and defence away from the Forester Town Hall and allows the training of first level units in your colonies.[[]]

cmd.name: [[14889906]]S@piritual Growth[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[14895515]]Second Forester upgrade. \n\n Enables the development of additional Forester units, buildings and upgrades.[[]]

cmd.name: [[14903886]]Wa@y of the Moon[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[14912742]]Third Forester upgrade. \n\n Allows the training of second level units in your colonies and enables the development of additional Forester units, buildings and upgrades.[[]]

cmd.name: [[14922642]]@Upgrade to Tree of Sprites[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[14939648]]Allows the training of Sprites. Sprites can infest an enemy unit and slowly drain its life until the unit dies.[[]]

cmd.name: [[14942713]]@Fatigue[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[14952888]]Enables Shamans to cast Fatigue on enemy units that use energy, decreasing their energy by #GetClassInt('Forester_Shaman', 'fatigue_damage')# and dealing an equal amount of damage to them.[[]]

cmd.name: [[14969491]]@Vitalize[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[14975071]]Allows Shamans to fully restore the energy of a friendly unit.[[]]

cmd.name: [[14981390]]@Mental Shock[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[14999633]]Enables Sprites to deal damage equal to their energy when they infest their target.[[]]

cmd.name: [[15003746]]@Invisibility[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15015680]]Enables Sprites to move unseen among enemy ranks.[[]]

cmd.name: [[15028295]]Ranger's G@uild[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15033223]]Significantly decreases the training time of Rangers.[[]]

cmd.name: [[15047950]]Ranger @Strength Training[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15058259]]Increases the Rangers' health points by #GetClassInt('Forester_Ranger', 'strength_upgrade_hp_bonus')#.[[]]

cmd.name: [[15068666]]@Weak Points[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15075791]]Provides Rangers with the ability to hit their targets in critical areas, causing them to get healed 50% slower and suffer #GetClassInt('Forester_Ranger', 'open_wound_damage')# per hit.[[]]

cmd.name: [[15087262]]@Entangling Tower[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15094323]]Upgrades the Tower to Entangling Tower, capable of launching vines at nearby enemies, rendering them incapable of moving for #GetClassInt('Forester_Tower', 'entangle_time') / 1000# seconds.[[]]

cmd.name: [[15100860]]@Upgrade to Hunter's Lodge[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15118917]]Allows the training of Hunters. Hunters are powerful ranged units that inflict damage to multiple enemies.[[]]

cmd.name: [[15120881]]Stones@kin[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15139543]]Increases the Clodhoppers' armour by #GetClassInt('Forester_Clodhopper', 'armor_upgrade_bonus')#.[[]]

cmd.name: [[15143278]]Clodhopper @Strength Training[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15156765]]Allows Clodhoppers to stun multiple units with Light armour with their attacks.[[]]

cmd.name: [[15161365]]Moon @Blade[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15171774]]Enables the Hunters' weapons to inflict #GetClassInt('Forester_Hunter', 'moonblade_damage')# additional damage to the first unit they hit.[[]]

cmd.name: [[15187587]]@Knife Throwing[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15192176]]Enables Wolf Masters to throw their knives from a distance.[[]]

cmd.name: [[15206186]]@Call of the Wild[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15212658]]Increases the maximum number of wolves a Wolf Master can have to four and enables Wolf Masters to summon additional wolves much faster.[[]]

cmd.name: [[15225654]]@Bloodlust[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15237914]]Enables Gray Wolves to inflict critical strikes of #GetClassInt('Forester_WolfMaster', 'bloodlust_damage')# damage against Mounted units and increases Wolf Masters' attack speed by 25%.[[]]

cmd.name: [[11854397]]@Ferocity[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15247915]]Enables Werewolves to gain health equal to their energy when they damage an enemy. In addition makes them stronger by 300hp.[[]]

cmd.name: [[15275283]]@Strength of the Forest[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15284149]]Increases the health and damage of units trained in your colonies by #GetClassInt('Forester_Townhall', 'strength_of_the_forest_bonus')#%.[[]]

cmd.name: [[15257039]]@Scout Wolves[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15267934]]Allows Wolf Masters to send wolves as invisible scouts to remote locations.[[]]

cmd.name: [[15295551]]Hunting @Parties[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[15308532]]Increases your population limit by #GetConst('ForesterHuntingPartiesBonus')# for each colony you control, including your main settlement.[[]]

cmd.name: [[ForesterMoon]]@Guardian of the Moon[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[ForesterMoon1]]Gives additional #GetClassInt('Forester_Hunter', 'moonguard_health_bonus')# health points and #GetClassInt('Forester_Hunter', 'moonguard_armor_bonus')# armor points to the hunter unit.[[]]

cmd.name: [[Lycanthropy]]@Lycanthropy[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[Lycanthropy1]]Adds a small amount of hp to Wolf Masters and Werewolves and in addition grants them the ability to slowly regenerate their health.[[]]

cmd.name: [[archery1]]S@kilful Archery[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[archery2]]Increases Rangers' attack by #GetClassInt('Forester_Ranger', 'archery_bonus_atack')# and gives them #GetClassInt('Forester_Ranger', 'archery_critical_chance')#% chance to deal critical damage to enemy units.[[]]

cmd.name: [[PrimalFury1]]@Primal Fury[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[PrimalFury2]]Increases the damage of all of the forester units by #GetClassInt('Forester_Townhall', 'primal_fury_bonus')#.[[]]
